title: "Server is busy"
body: I keep getting this message when I try to log in. No one's complaining about it on here as far as I can see, is it only happening to me?

replies.body:
FIX: type your password in the login box and copy it by selecting it, then try logining in again..when it says "server is busy" press enter then ctrl+v your password in instead of typing it again everytime..from there press enter everytime you get server is busy and keep pasting your password this should be done a lot more quicker..you should get in within 10 tries..good luck. 
- Addi M

> FIX: type your password in the login box and copy it by selecting it, then try logining in again..when it says "server is busy" press enter then ctrl+v your password in instead of typing it again everytime..from there press enter everytime you get server is busy and keep pasting your password this should be done a lot more quicker..you should get in within 10 tries..good luck. 
> - Addi M

This worked for me.  Thanks!

This'll be my first red response! I always check the status page when something's weird, but at the time of posting it had not yet been updated. After my first game it had been though. I'm glad you guys are always so on top of it!
I just got in, after a short que. Still, weird.
nop im in the same boat

Hey all, thanks for the reports here. We are aware of the issue and have found a solution. We are working on implementing it now. Thank you for your patience.

As for the rest of the platform, health is fine. Games are being played as we speak, so once you get into the service, you should be good to go!

So are you guys going to tell leaver buster to back off? I crashed mid game and had to try to log in for about 7 minutes(said the server was busy) and after the game I had to type"I Agree" (to not leave anymore games) just to be allowed to leave the post game screen. I wouldn't take "Fix you game". lol
Copy password and keep trying. Eventually it will work.

not when it starts saying the password combo is incorrect, i even changed my password..... i have not been able to play in months and then this shti happens :( i just wanna play while my wife is asleep........................................................

It's ctrl + c...
it says that servers are busy.... What is going on because my friend just got on and i have been trying to get on? With all do respect?

I got disconnected due to my modem reboot, and then i couldnt connect for like 5-10 Minutes, and then i got the Leave Buster warning, i hope that the system is able to differentiate between user issue/DCs and server errors/bugs.
lol dudes I crashed like fk and got leaver buster warning and now the server is busy sign is coming out so I cant even log in now lol I wonder how busy Riot is

I'm getting it too sadly
went to restart my client cause I couldn't recieve an invite from my friend, now i can't login.
I have this same problem. I will read most of this topic and then try whatever..

Hey, I got that too, about 8 to 9 hrs ago. League stopped responding and kicked me off during an aram match. I tried to log in for about 5 minutes by using copy and paste but got the same error message. I thought it was just league having maintenance or something. But I logged in today and got a AFK report. So I got reported on the game by the fault of the game, great. I'm sort of glad I'm not the only person who had this issue.

My computer crashed, and when I attempted to log back in it gave me that message. I thus was unable to rejoin the game I was in and now Riot has given me a warning for going afk in matches. 

At the very least Riot, take responsibility for the fact that I would have only been afk in a match for ~1 minute if it weren't for you.
I hate dis

I still having this problem.
See doesn't even matter if your password is right or wrong you gonna get the same freaking error...

Open Internet explorer --> open internet options --> click advanced tab --> scroll down and uncheck the two boxes named "Check for server certificate revocation*" and "Check for signatures on downloaded programs".

Worked for me but make sure internet explorer is set as your default browser!

I wanna say this worked for me. But one of the things i unchecked requires a pc restart. except i didnt restart my pc and i was able to log in. so idk. (late reply. I did this earlier, but im just replying now.
Me tooo!!!!
Same here been trying for about 15 mins now. Whats up?
